title: Surviving the Apocalypse: 101
description: Life after the apocalypse is anything but easy.Claire has survived the end of the world - a plague that destroyed the human race, leaving them dead or worse - and now her life is a constant battle to stay alive, to stay one step ahead of the creatures, to make it to the city where she believes there may be other survivors.But the creatures are not the only threat and staying alive in the city is harder than she thought.Can she find survivors? And will they accept her?
author: Nicole   Crampton
